DataElement.preferredName: Multiple Sclerosis Involvement Occurrence Yes No Character Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not multiple sclerosis involvement occurred.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A disorder of the central nervous system marked by weakness, numbness, a loss of muscle coordination, and problems with vision, speech, and bladder control. Multiple sclerosis is thought to be an autoimmune disease in which the body's immune system destroys myelin. Myelin is a substance that contains both protein and fat (lipid), serving as a nerve insulator and helping in the transmission of nerve signals._To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A disorder of the central nervous system marked by weakness, numbness, a loss of muscle coordination, and problems with vision, speech, and bladder control. Multiple sclerosis is thought to be an autoimmune disease in which the body's immune system destroys myelin. Myelin is a substance that contains both protein and fat (lipid), serving as a nerve insulator and helping in the transmission of nerve signals.:To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

Concepts.definition: A progressive autoimmune disorder affecting the central nervous system resulting in demyelination. Patients develop physical and cognitive impairments that correspond with the affected nerve fibers.
To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator of Yes or No to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the multiple sclerosis have a particular involvement?

ReferenceDocuments.name: BRIDG mapping path for CDE:2750623
ReferenceDocuments.description: "[IF EXISTS THEN ""true"" ELSE ""false""] PerformedDiagnosis [primary] > AssessedResultRelationship > PerformedObservation [assessment] > AssessedResultRelationship > PerformedDiagnosis.resultClassificationCode(ANY=>CD).originalText [secondary] {specified involvement}WHERE  PerformedDiagnosis.value [primary] = ""Multiple Sclerosis"" AND PerformedDiagnosis.resultClassificationCode [secondary] = {specified disorder} AND PerformedDiagnosis [primary] > PerformedProcedure [overall HCT process] AND PerformedObservation [assessment] > PerformedClinicalInterpretation.value = ""Involvement""  AND PerformedObservation [assessment] > DefinedObservation.nameCode = ""Assess Involvement"" "
